search.description: Search icon for search inputs and actions

ellipsis-v.description: Vertical ellipsis icon for menu actions and options

chevron-right.description: Right-pointing chevron for navigation, expansion, and forward movement

chevron-down.description: Down-pointing chevron for collapsible sections and disclosure patterns

clock.description: Clock icon for time-related information and scheduling

cog.description: Cog/gear icon for settings and configuration actions

expand-all.description: Expand all icon for revealing all collapsed items or sections

external-link.description: External link icon indicating a link opens in a new window or external site

plus-circle.description: Plus circle icon for add and create actions

trash.description: Trash icon for delete and remove actions

info-circle.description: Info circle icon for informational messages and notices

check-circle.description: Check circle icon for success states and completed actions

exclamation-circle.description: Exclamation circle icon for warnings and error states
